name: Marietto
description:
This game is the porting of the original game "Marietto" I coded for the Commodore Amiga in 1997.

Purpose of the game? Make as many points as possible. Hit the aliens, kick the daggers, avoid the boulders, collect the coins, stay alive as long as you can. Let me know if you can get past 100,000 points (I only did it three times, for now).

Read the "Marietto.txt" file for gameplay instructions.
